dandia.title: Dandia
dandia.desc: A versatile Kenyan cross-platform app facilitating easy bookings for cars, buses, and shuttles, streamlining transportation options for users.

questionnaire.title: Questionnaire app
questionnaire.desc: Questionnaire app designed to estimate users' video game addiction levels through comprehensive assessments.

ewriters.title: eWriters
ewriters.desc: Freelancing web app facilitating secure connections between clients and freelancers while ensuring protection for both parties.
